document.full_text: dozens of people left a district of ivory coast's commercial capital on sunday after gun battles, and presidential claimant alassane ouattara made it back from an au summit, despite concerns about his security.
document.title: ivorians flee after clashes, gbagbo camp defiant
lines_and_colors: dozens of people left a district of ivory coast's commercial capital on sunday after gun battles, and presidential claimant alassane ouattara made it back from an au summit, despite concerns about his security.
